title: Gpa very low need help
content: So my gpa is 6.70 exactly  after 4 sems.....i know its very bad...i had the issue of travelling  so next sem im joining  pg to resolve the issue..now currently i have 2 monthz in my hand...so is there anything i can do (like do some project ) or should i think of preparing  gate for 3rd year..or should i focus on dsa for now..and hope my gpa to cross above 7 or something....or is there anything  else you would like to suggest me..pls do help..thanks in advance

comments.body:
Hey man look, college is hard. Don't be so hard on yourself. I guess you're a bit late to join any centers for a project but you can definitely approach any professor of your liking and ask them for a project (preferably go with a team) and they almost never ask for your gpa. Idk if you're from CSE or are looking to go in that field, but yes, DSA is important if you're going in that direction. I suggest you take up certifications online if you don't get any projects.

P.S.: 5th sem is genuinely easier compared to the other semesters (except one or two subjects). Just work a little hard and you'll be good to go!

Try to keep ur gpa above 7 at any cost. By  6th Sem companies will come for internship so definitely start doing DSA and don't worry getting above 7 should be manageable .Just try to get as much marks in ISA u can
Thanks for your advice man.i really hope i do well next semester
